products.name: Crunchy Chips
products.description: Enjoy the perfect crunch with our SnackTime Crunchy Chips. Made from the finest potatoes, these chips are lightly salted for a deliciously savory snack. Perfect for sharing at parties, movie nights, or just for a quick snack on the go!
products.Ingredients: Potatoes, vegetable oil (canola, sunflower), salt, natural flavoring, chilli

products.name: cadbury
products.description: Cadbury Dairy Milk Silk is all about regaling in the richness and creaminess of chocolate. Indulge in a rich, smooth, and creamy celebration.

products.name: Coke Zero 355ml
products.description: Enjoy the classic taste of Coca-Cola, a refreshing soft drink that has been loved by millions for generations. Perfect for any occasion, Coca-Cola is best served chilled and is the ideal partner for meals, snacks, or just as a treat on its own.
products.Ingredients: Carbonated water, high fructose corn syrup, caramel color, phosphoric acid, natural flavors, caffeine.

products.name: Tasty Orange juice
products.description: Refresh yourself with our Fresh Orange Juice made from 100% pure oranges. Packed with vitamins and bursting with flavor, this juice is perfect for breakfast, a midday boost, or any time you crave a refreshing drink.
products.Ingredients: 100% pure orange juice, no added sugars or preservatives.
